description.p: Domestique Baston is a 1 vs 1 fighting game. Well. You know what that is... It’s intended for casual gamers as the gameplay is simple...
It pictures a couple fighting each other at home. That’s the reason why there is only 1 background and 2 playable characters.
This game is in French slang just because it’s funny. No other reason. Besides, who really cares about, for instance, the story or even what’s told in such a game?
